state.code:
classDiagram

%% Interface
class CalculateBill {
  <<interface>>
  +double calculate()
}

%% Payment class
class Payment {
  -double incomingInterest
  -double outgoingInterest

  +Payment(String date, String description, double amount, double incomingInterest, double outgoingInterest)
  +Payment(Payment payment)
  +double getIncomingInterest()
  +double getOutgoingInterest()
  +void setIncomingInterest(double incomingInterest)
  +void setOutgoingInterest(double outgoingInterest)
  +double calculate()
  +String toString()
  +boolean equals(Object o)
}

%% Transaction class
class Transaction {
  -String date
  -String description
  -double amount

  +Transaction(String date, String description, double amount)
  +String getDate()
  +void setDate(String date)
  +String getDescription()
  +void setDescription(String description)
  +double getAmount()
  +void setAmount(double amount)
  +String toString()
  +boolean equals(Object o)
}

%% Transfer class
class Transfer {
  -String sender
  -String recipient

  +Transfer(String date, String description, double amount, String sender, String recipient)
  +Transfer(Transfer transfer)
  +String getRecipient()
  +void setRecipient(String recipient)
  +String getSender()
  +void setSender(String sender)
  +double calculate()
  +String toString()
  +boolean equals(Object o)
}

%% Relationships
Payment ..|> CalculateBill
Transfer ..|> CalculateBill
Payment --> Transaction
Transfer --> Transaction
